questions.question: Which of these represents a point?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'> <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='3' fill='red'/> <line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke='blue' stroke-width='2'/> <rect x='150' y='30' width='40' height='40' fill='pink' stroke='black'/></svg>
questions.explanation: The small black dot on the left is how we represent a point.
